MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-NOV-2020 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the SY15 postcode area of Montgomery, affecting properties in Llandyssil and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.55AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 7.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.30PM on 27th November 2020.
